price: Wale walio amini na wakatenda mema watakuwa na raha na marejeo mazuri.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمۡ وَحُسۡنُ مَـَٔابٖ
footnotes: Na hakika wanao inyenyekea Haki, na wakasimama kutenda vitendo vyema, hao watapata malipo mema, na mwisho mzuri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ṭūbā lahum waḥus'nu maābin
